body_html:
I was able to sucessfully compile with:

Bazel      0.13.0
CUDA       9.1.85.3
cuDNN      7.1.3
NCCL       2.1.15
GCC        5.4 (5.5 did not work)

./configure
bazel build --config=opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

body:
I was able to sucessfully compile with:

```
Bazel      0.13.0
CUDA       9.1.85.3
cuDNN      7.1.3
NCCL       2.1.15
GCC        5.4 (5.5 did not work)

./configure
bazel build --config=opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package 
```
